item.description:
We had a great turn out for our run last time so let's go for another run and swim.

Join me for a 4.5 mile trail run starting and ending at Walden Pond. The route begins along the pond shoreline. About halfway around the pond we will cross the railroad tracks into Lincoln woods. We'll run on multiple trails on a nice loop and finish back where we started from on the pond loop.

The trails are fairly level with limited rocks and roots and the pace will be approximately 9 min/per mile.

After the run we'll cool off with a swim in the pond. (this is optional). The reservation has changing rooms near the main entrance.

The Parking fee at the reservation is $5. Alternatively you can park at the Concord High School which is across RT 2 on Rt 126. You'll have about a 1/2 run to the Pond from there.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in front of the gift shop near the main entrance to the Pond.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Walden Pond Trail Run/Swim
